Headline: #95 95th Temporary Reroute at 92nd/Exchange
ShortDescription: 95 95th buses are temporarily rerouted via 93rd, South Chicago, Commercial, 92nd, then resume their normal route due to street blockage near 92nd/Exchange.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#95 95th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 93rd, South Chicago, Commercial, 92nd, then resume their normal route due to street blockage near 92nd/Exchange.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #30 South Chicago Temporary Reroute at 92nd/Exchange
ShortDescription: 30 South Chicago buses are rerouted via South Chicago, 91st, Commercial, 92nd, then resume their normal route, due to street blockage near 92nd/Exchange.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#30 South Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via South Chicago, 91st, Commercial, 92nd, then resume their normal route, due to street blockage near 92nd/Exchange.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Pulaski
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Pulaski due to mechanical problem on a train.  Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Pulaski due to mechanical problem on a train. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
